input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team short sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core long sleeve'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Explore short sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Rapha Rapha + Shrimps Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's MTB 3/4 Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Jersey'
  - Name='Man Rapha Brevet Element Jersey'
  - Name='Jersey Rapha Men's Brevet long sleeve white'
  - Name='Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Aero Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Long Sleeve Windstopper Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Insulated Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Jersey'
  - Name='Man Rapha Core Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey BNE01XX'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's RCC Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Jersey long sleeve'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Flaero Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Gravel Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Long Sleeve Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-quality cycling jerseys for men designed for comfort and durability, likely with similar core features though the Classic may focus on traditional styling rather than specifically lightweight or moisture-wicking technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While also a cycling jersey focusing on lightweight construction, this is positioned as a more performance-oriented Pro Team model, possibly differing in fit and technical features from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical product category and name, both are Core Jerseys from a cycling brand, indicating very similar design intent, fit, and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A variant of the Core line that emphasizes lightweight materials, sharing many key features with the reference Core Jersey but likely lighter construction and possibly less durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team short sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High performance Pro Team short sleeve jersey intended for racing, which might be lighter and more aerodynamic than the reference Core Jersey geared for comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core long sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Closely related to the Core Jersey but with long sleeves, so similar tech and fit focusing on comfort and durability for cycling, with slight difference in sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Higher-end performance jersey for racing, likely more technical and lightweight, differing from the comfort and durability focus of the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specialized racing jersey designed for criterium racing, probably more aerodynamic and race-focused than the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Explore short sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a more casual cycling shirt or jersey for exploration rides, possibly less technical and lacking compression or performance fabrics compared to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Rapha + Shrimps Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Appears to be a collaboration jersey, possibly more fashion-oriented or limited edition, less focused on technical cycling performance and features of the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's MTB 3/4 Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mountain bike jersey with 3/4 sleeves, which differs in sleeve length, cut, and potentially fabric from a road cycling Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aerodynamic Pro Team jersey focused on speed and racing, more technical and form-fitting for aero benefits, somewhat different than comfort-focused Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Rapha Brevet Element Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Brevet jersey designed for endurance rides, likely with some durable and weather-resistant features, but differing in specific technology and cut from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Jersey Rapha Men's Brevet long sleeve white
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve Brevet jersey for endurance cycling, sharing some functional similarities but longer sleeves and potentially heavier materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Aero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specialized Pro Team aero jersey for competitive cycling, focusing on aerodynamics and performance, differing from the versatile Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Long Sleeve Windstopper Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve Windstopper jersey for wind protection, more specialized for weather resistance, differing in core fabric and intended use from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Insulated Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Insulated jersey variant, offering warmth not described in the Core Jersey, suggesting more specialized function and different construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro Team jersey aligned with racing and high performance, more specialized and potentially less focused on broad comfort like the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Rapha Core Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey BNE01XX
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal and long sleeve version of the Core jersey that shares the base features of the Core but adds insulation and longer sleeves.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve Pro Team jersey designed for racing and performance, differing somewhat in focus and potentially materials from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's RCC Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic style jersey with RCC branding, similar in style and function to Core jerseys but potentially with a traditional cut and fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Classic Jersey long sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve version of the Classic style cycling jersey, similar function and fit but differing in sleeve length and possibly fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Flaero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a Pro Team aero jersey variant, specialized for aerodynamics and racing, differing from the Core Jersey which balances comfort and durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Gravel Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Gravel-specific Pro Team jersey that may have additional features for gravel riding, distinct from the road cycling Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's RCC Pro Team Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve Pro Team jersey tied to the RCC group, performance focused for racing, differing from the Core Jersey's emphasis on comfort and everyday durability.
